Text: This is the series on HBO right? There used to be another one airing in UK before with the same name.
They are the same show. Strike Back is a British TV show broadcast on Sky 1 in the UK and also shown on HBO in the US.

Actually it's being marketed as a Cinemax original show in US. 
I'm just wondering whether it's reairing of the first episode of season 1, which had 6 eps in UK already a long time ago, or an actual first episode of season 2, which is aimed to have 10 eps...?
